price: Dájúdájú wọn yóò ru ẹrù ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ tiwọn àti àwọn ẹrù ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kan mọ́ ẹrù ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ tiwọn. Àti pé dájúdájú A óò bi wọ́n léèrè ní Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde nípa ohun tí wọ́n ń dá ní àdápa irọ́.¹
arabic: وَلَيَحۡمِلُنَّ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَالٗا مَّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡۖ وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walayaḥmilunna athqālahum wa-athqālan maʿa athqālihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyāmati ʿammā kānū yaftarūna
translations: and surely they will be questioned
